name: Ape Ship
description:
THE SHIP IS ALIVE

You are aboard a cyborg whaleship that is soaring through space. Its vital organs are located around the ship, keeping various systems working. Surely if the giant cyborg lungs stop breathing, there will be some issues…

PRIMATE PIRATES

Apes from space have jumped aboard the whaleship and are trying to destroy it! A monkey runs around the ship sabotaging the whale’s organs, while a rampaging gorilla chases you down to smash you to a pulp.

REPAIR AND SURVIVE

Get home safely by repairing the whale’s organs, and outsmarting the aggressive apes.

Can you survive and make it home? See for yourself in Ape Ship!
